title: Pedestrian, 72, in critical condition after being hit by car in Pointe-Claire
author: Montreal Gazette
blurb: Traffic was barred from St-Jean Blvd. between Brunswick and Salaberry Blvds. and on Labrosse Ave. between Auto Plaza Ave. and Revcon Ave.

title: Quebec independence is viable, but it would require sacrifices: Legault
author: Philip Authier
blurb: "For the great, great, great majority of Quebecers, holding a referendum on sovereignty is quite simply not a priority," premier says.
